original_title: Custodios Del Archipiélago: Saberes En Acción.
overview: The Forest Stewards Network, born in 2015, relays on a action-driven work and  participatory reasearch. Through horizontal and collaborative bonds with the goal of  good living and well being, based on the construction of knowledge, social power and  transformative action between diversities.
title: Custodios Del Archipiélago: Saberes En Acción.
